item.title: Home Hill Winery - Ranelagh, Tasmania - Wines
item.description:
Home Hill Winery - Ranelagh, Tasmania - Wines

Located in the Huon Valley, Home Hill grows a variety of Pinot Noir, Chardonnay and Sylvaner grapes in a climate similar to that of the Bordeaux of France. Our maritime climate and rainfall result in superior grapes which allow us to produce superior wines.

item.title: Wineries, Breweries & Distilleries - Hobart and Beyond
item.description:
Wineries, Breweries & Distilleries - Hobart and Beyond

Our craft brews can be enjoyed along the waterfront, our whiskies have been coined the world's best and our bubbles have raised the brows of Frenchmen. If you enjoy sampling your chosen drop at the source, Hobart and beyond is the place for you.

item.title: Lark Distillery
item.description:
Lark Distillery

Situated on the Hobart waterfront, Lark Cellar Door & Whisky Bar offers the opportunity to taste Tasmania's finest whisky and other distilled spirits in a warm and inviting atmosphere. From great coffees, local beers, and Tasmanian cheese platters, to live country roots and blue grass bands every Friday and Saturday night, the eclectic bar is a mecca for both locals and visitors alike.

item.title: Royal Hobart International Wine Show
item.description:
Royal Hobart International Wine Show

First held in 1975 it has grown steadily in popularity and status to become the second largest wine show in the country. Its reputation as the showcase of a wide range of high quality wines of all styles has blossomed as part of this development, with an ever-increasing stream of high praise coming from judges, wine writers, exhibitors from all over Australia and the general public.

item.title: Nant Whisky
item.description:
Nant Whisky

Nant Distilling Company, home of the only Tasmanian Highland Single Malt Whisky. Tours and functions available. Located in Bothwell, Tasmania, Australia.

item.title: Mona Blog
item.description:
Mona Blog

A blog about things that relate to Mona, and that don't.

item.title: Mona
item.description:
Mona

Museum of Old and New Art in Hobart, Tasmania. Ancient, modern and contemporary art. Bars, cafe, restaurant, cinema, and cemetery on site. And other things to do while you're there.
